MAIN: ^Why do they call you Wisgarus the Ugly?
WhoAmI: ^My name is Wisgarus! I am but a humble knight of the Sanctus Empire! Now, who are you may I ask? I pray you do not hail from Magia my friend!
MagiaExplained: ^They are most vile creatures who would defile the very sanctity of life by using the body as a playground for their wicked experiments!

c-0: ^Oh you have no idea my friend, the only thing worse than those nasty Magians are the undead wretches they have created!

MagiaEncountered: ^You fiend! How dare you tresspass into our land! Leave or I will skewer that excuse for a heart with my Shivrian steel!
^Bring it on you levereter! (Did I really just say that?)
Ugly: ^Ugly?! Who called me Ugly?! I'll kill 'em!
^Oh, it's just.. your name.. never mind...
^I did you fool, bring it on!
LocationInfo: ^This is Farnfoss, the western-most village in the entire Sanctus Empire! The village folk here primarily work to protect the border from any attacks.
Enemies: ^Well we primarily defend against the undead which plague the Uada woods, however, we also stand in the way of any Magian advance.
